content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = filter(startswith("#"), "```Julia"), collect(replace(md, "\n```Julia\n", ""))) do block
        end
    joined_code = join(code_blocks, "\n")) # Join with a newline
    return joined_code
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes in a markdown document `md`. It extracts all code blocks that are indented with triple backticks (```Julia```) and removes the code fences. Then it joins these code blocks together with a newline character.

Finally, it returns the joined code as a string.
